[event]
# to Abandoned Mineshaft
type=on_trigger
location=6,3,2,1
intermap=abandoned_mineshaft.txt,27,34

[event]
# Shared Stash
type=on_trigger
location=23,25,1,1
hotspot=location
soundfx=soundfx/wood_open.ogg
stash=true
tooltip=Shared Stash

[npc]
# Blacksmith
type=udana
location=18,26,1,1

[npc]
# Apothecary
type=florin
location=24,21,1,1
